tool_description: Extracts significant keywords and phrases from customer feedback to identify common themes and topics.

feedback_text.description: Array of feedback text from which to extract keywords

max_keywords.description: Maximum number of keywords to extract per feedback

min_word_length.description: Minimum length of words to consider as keywords

extraction_method.description: Method for keyword extraction: frequency, tfidf, rake

include_phrases.description: Whether to extract multi-word phrases in addition to single words

error_messages: Empty feedback array: Provide at least one feedback text entry.
Invalid max_keywords: Value must be a positive integer between 1 and 100.
Invalid min_word_length: Value must be between 2 and 10.
Invalid extraction method: Use one of [frequency, tfidf, rake].
Insufficient text: Feedback contains too little text for meaningful keyword extraction.
usage: Provide feedback text and configure extraction parameters. The tool identifies and ranks important keywords and phrases.

extracted_keywords.description: Array of extracted keywords and phrases

keyword_scores.description: Importance scores for each extracted keyword

top_keywords.description: Most frequently occurring keywords across all feedback
